Stinkbomb/Ramhorn/Koga Shuko/Unitron/Anubis/Hades:

::Stinkbomb as he fired his shots off at Suukie, smiling in satisfaction, not 
feeling the other laser bolts (which rather coincidentally came out of a 
heavy laser rifle that Suukie's never used before in the war) tear through 
him, his head suddenly slamming against the wall repeatedly he was leaning 
against, his arm jerking forward, the detonator slamming into Ramhorn's face::

::Ramhorn awoke, looking to the detonator, then the toppled over forms of 
Suukie and Stinkbomb::
"Enemies...OF THE OVERMIND!" ::Ramhorn, not as badly damaged yelled, getting 
up, holing the detonator.  Reaching into subspace, he pulled out two charges, 
tossing them between Suukie and Stinkbomb, running over to the charges, 
setting them to explode in 10 seconds.  Walking outside of the bridge, 
Ramhorn waits for the two charges to go off::
"Five, four, three, two, one...ZERO!" he counts off, the charges should've 
been exploding about then.

===================

::Koga Shuko looked from Unitron, to Anubis, to Hades::
"Let's move out!" ::he yelled, all four heading for the Alliance base::
